column5: Has anyone ever herd of a crankbait called the ugly duckling im not sure who makes it or thats the name of the company but im on my last one great walleye and smallie bait l bought them at walmart afew years back and havent been able to find them again. Im not even sure if they still make them now
I bought several of them at Walmart a few years back. They looked very nice and the price was right but I found that they didn't run very well. So it was back to Rapala for me.
Gagnons in Oshawa had a 8 foot section of those baits in all colours and sizes not sure if they still do or not
